arts.ttl: ‘Our relationship has always been fluid’ – Didier Deschamps on his relationship with Antoine Griezmann
arts.sum: Speaking to Téléfoot, following Antoine Griezmann’s (33) decision to retire from international football, Didier Deschamps commented on his relationship with the Atlético Madrid attacking midfielder. Griezmann’s relationship with Deschamps has not…

arts.ttl: Antoine Griezmann initially planned to retire from international football in 2019
arts.sum: According to Téléfoot, Atlético Madrid attacking midfielder Antoine Griezmann (33) initially planned to retire from international football and representing France in 2019. The Frenchman planned to retire due to a lack…

arts.ttl: Barcelona, Atletico Madrid 'battling for £42m Arsenal star' amid contract uncertainty
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid reportedly show an interest in re-signing Thomas Partey from Arsenal next summer but face competition from Barcelona.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone and Atletico Madrid staying positive after tough week
arts.sum: Atleti lost in Lisbon after their derby draw.

arts.ttl: Atlético boss Simeone launches defence of Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid head coach Diego Simeone has on Saturday moved to defend upcoming opponents Real Sociedad. La Real, for their part, are in the midst of something of an underwhelming…
